ubx_message.name: UBX-MON-HW
ubx_message.description: Status of different aspect of the hardware, such as antenna, PIO/peripheral pins, noise level, automatic gain control (AGC). This message is deprecated in this protocol version. Use UBX-MON-HW3 and UBX-MON-RF instead.

payload_fields.name: version
payload_fields.description: Message version (0x01 for this version)

payload_fields.name: supported
payload_fields.description: A bit mask showing the major GNSS that can be supported by this receiver

payload_fields.name: defaultGnss
payload_fields.description: A bit mask showing the default major GNSS selection. If the default major GNSS selection is currently configured in the efuse for this receiver, it takes precedence over the default major GNSS selection configured in the executing firmware of this receiver.

payload_fields.name: enabled
payload_fields.description: A bit mask showing the current major GNSS selection enabled for this receiver

payload_fields.name: simultaneous
payload_fields.description: Maximum number of concurrent major GNSS that can be supported by this receiver

payload_fields.name: pinSel
payload_fields.description: Mask of pins set as peripheral/PIO

payload_fields.name: pinVal
payload_fields.description: Mask of pins value low/high

payload_fields.name: noisePerMS
payload_fields.description: Noise level as measured by the GPS core

payload_fields.name: agcCnt
payload_fields.description: AGC monitor (counts SIGHI xor SIGLO, range 0 to 8191)

payload_fields.name: aStatus
payload_fields.description: Status of the antenna supervisor state machine (0=INIT, 1=DONTKNOW, 2=OK, 3=SHORT, 4=OPEN)

payload_fields.name: aPower
payload_fields.description: Current power status of antenna (0=OFF, 1=ON, 2=DONTKNOW)

payload_fields.name: flags
payload_fields.description: Flags

bit_fields.name: jammingState
bit_fields.description: Output from jamming/interference monitor (0 = unknown or feature disabled, 1 = ok - no significant jamming, 2 = warning - interference visible but fix OK, 3 = critical - interference visible and no fix)

bit_fields.name: xtalAbsent
bit_fields.description: RTC xtal has been determined to be absent (not supported for protocol versions less than 18.00)

payload_fields.name: usedMask
payload_fields.description: Mask of pins that are used by the virtual pin manager

payload_fields.name: VP
payload_fields.description: Array of pin mappings for each of the 17 physical pins

payload_fields.name: jamInd
payload_fields.description: CW jamming indicator, scaled (0 = no CW jamming, 255 = strong CW jamming)

payload_fields.name: pinIrq
payload_fields.description: Mask of pins value using the PIO Irq

payload_fields.name: pullH
payload_fields.description: Mask of pins value using the PIO pull high resistor

payload_fields.name: pullL
payload_fields.description: Mask of pins value using the PIO pull low resistor
